ch0290_40_teru/0101_0701_01_10:
You made it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Let’s head to school together.
ch0290_40_teru/0101_0701_02_10:
Or would you rather race to see who gets
there first?
ch0290_40_teru/7101_0701_01_10: I never thought I’d be going to school on Pasio!
ch0290_40_teru/7101_0701_02_10:
But when I go to bed with my heart racing,
anticipating a test...
ch0290_40_teru/7101_0701_03_10:
it brings me back to my first day in Hisui,
when I took on the entry trial for the Galaxy
Expedition Team.
ch0290_40_teru/7102_0701_01_10:
I want to keep learning more about history
in class.
ch0290_40_teru/7102_0701_02_10:
I want to know how humans and Pokémon used
to live!
ch0290_40_teru/7103_0701_01_10: Have you ever flown on a Braviary before?
ch0290_40_teru/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s so exhilarating, and you can get anywhere
in just one swoop!
ch0290_40_teru/7103_0701_03_10:
Even if you were running late to school, you could
get there in a flash with Braviary’s help!
ch0290_40_teru/7104_0701_01_10:
Clothes have amazing power. When I wear a
uniform, I feel like my mind snaps to attention.
ch0290_40_teru/7104_0701_02_10:
How do I put it... It’s like flipping a switch, and I
become motivated to do my best that day!
ch0290_40_teru/7105_0701_01_10:
Since the school was just set up, everyone is at
the same level.
ch0290_40_teru/7105_0701_02_10:
We’ll be spending time together as classmates,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0290_40_teru/1701_0701_01_10: I found this on my way to school. Do you need it?
ch0290_40_teru/1701_0702_01_10: I’ll be fine without it, so you have it!
ch0290_40_teru/2501_0701_01_10:
I wonder if I went to school before I lost my
memories.
ch0290_40_teru/2501_0701_02_10:
If I did, that means I’ll have two schools to
remember.
ch0290_40_teru/2501_0701_03_10:
That might not be so bad if it means I’ll have
double the fun memories.
ch0290_40_teru/2501_0702_01_10:
I also learned a lot when I first started on the
Galaxy Expedition Team...
ch0290_40_teru/2501_0702_02_10:
So maybe I’ll actually have triple the school
memories?
ch0290_40_teru/2511_0701_01_10:
The more I learn, the more I understand—even if
just a little—why people become dedicated to
studying and research.
ch0290_40_teru/2511_0701_02_10:
But while some may use that knowledge to help
people and Pokémon...
ch0290_40_teru/2511_0701_03_10: others may use it for their own desires.
ch0290_40_teru/2511_0701_04_10:
Both kinds of people must start off the same,
so I wonder where their paths diverge.
ch0290_40_teru/2511_0702_01_10:
I guess knowledge is more powerful than
you’d think.
ch0290_40_teru/2511_0702_02_10:
Since we’re learning together, I’m sure we’re both
on the same path!
ch0290_40_teru/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning. You’re up early. I was up late,
so I’m sleepy...
ch0290_40_teru/3003_0701_01_10:
Life is complicated, but let’s cherish the time we
have and where we are right now!
ch0290_40_teru/3005_0701_01_10:
I’m so tired from running around all day...
Time for a hearty meal and a heavy sleep!
